name: Fireball
description: Launches a ball of fire at the enemy.

name: Waterblade
description: Slices the enemy with a slash of water.

name: Airspike
description: Shoots a sharp spike of air at the enemy.

name: Earthwall
description: Launches a ball of fire at the enemy.

name: Chidori
description: Pierces a bolt of lightning through the enemy.
